PersonalStatement.text: Melissa Perez, born on 1984-05-06, is a Female based in West Shannonhaven, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. She is Married and holds Swedish nationality. Currently working at Rice, Bentley and White.

WorkExperience.text: Research Scientist at Stewart LLC from 2009 to 2016.
Senior Marketing Specialist at Rice, Bentley and White, 2023 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from INTI International University
Master's in Engineering from Ahlia University

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys hiking.
